thread.title: Eddie Murphy’s anti-gay shtick
thread.title_full: Eddie Murphy’s anti-gay shtick - The Washington Post

author: John Woodrow Cox
title: Eddie Murphy’s anti-gay shtick
text:
Eddie Murphy arrives at the Kennedy Center for the Mark Twain Prize for American Humor ceremony that honored Murphy on Sunday in Washington. (Matt McClain/The Washington Post) October 19 at 5:20 PM Regarding the Oct. 18 Style article “ Get ready for Eddie ”:
I remember watching Eddie Murphy’s show “Delirious” on TV in the early 1980s. I thought he was hilarious. Then he made a number of jokes about gay people and people with AIDS. Several friends of mine were dying with AIDS at the time. Those jokes were cruel and hateful, and they no doubt encouraged others.
Although he issued a
